description:
First, the real star of Ninja Nonsense finally gets his own episode! Expect more explosions, more naked girls, and more full-throttle Sasuke action! So good, you`ll need to watch it a second time!  Then, the ninjas are putting on a play of the "Grateful C
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I. Começa O Sasukeden! / II. Ninja, Retribuindo Um Favor!
La légende de Sasuke / Le ninja reconnaissant
Sasukeden, Hajimaru no Maki / Ninja, Ongaeshi Suru no Maki
The Legend of Sasuke Begins / The Grateful Ninja
サスケ伝, 始まるの巻 / 忍者, 恩返しするの巻
